RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute Class Reference

#include <optionattribute.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

An attribute that will be shown in the launcher's option dialog.

The option's attribute classes are used by the OptionManager to create the LauncherOptions gui.

It is a pure virtual class that can not be instancied. Please use a subclass.

See also:
OptionManager, OptionIntAttribute, OptionStringAttribute, OptionFloatAttribute, OptionListAttribute, OptionIntRangeAttribute, OptionFloatRangeAttribute.

Definition at line 67 of file optionattribute.h.

A typed default constructor.

This calls setType() with t as parameter.

Parameters:
t The type of the newly created attribute (or your custom type).

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setType ( tOptionAttributeType  t  ) 

Set the type of the attribute.

Set OptionAttribute::type to t. If the type is OAT_UNKNOWN, a warning log message is sent to the Logger.

See also:
getType(), type.
Parameters:
t The new type of the attribute

Definition at line 47 of file optionattribute.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setName ( const char *  n  ) 

Set the name of the attribute.

Logs a warning message if the name is empty. The control of the lenght of the string is done by std::strlen.

See also:
getName(), name
Parameters:
n The new name of the attribute

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getToolTip (  ) 

Get the tooltip text of the attribute.

The name can contains space and other specials character but keep in mind this is used as the label of the option (in LauncherOptions dialog).

See also:
setToolTip(), tooltip

Definition at line 135 of file optionattribute.cpp.

virtual bool RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setValueStr ( const char *   )  [pure virtual]

A virtual function used in serialization of the attribute.

This function must be overloaded by subclasses. It is used by the OptionManager to store the attribute value in a xml file.

Implemented in RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionFloatAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionFloatRangeAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionListAttribute, and RainbruRPG::Options::OptionStringAttribute.

virtual const char* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getValueStr (  )  const [pure virtual]

A virtual function used in serialization of the attribute.

This function must be overloaded by subclasses. It is used by the OptionManager to store the attribute value in a xml file.

Implemented in RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionFloatAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute, RainbruRPG::Options::OptionListAttribute, and RainbruRPG::Options::OptionStringAttribute.

const char* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::tooltip [private]

The tooltip associated with this attribute.

A tooltip is an help string shown if the LauncherOptions dialog, when you let the mouse over a widget.

See also:
setToolTip(), getToolTip()

FXObject* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::widget [protected]

The widget linked to this attribute.

For the update of the graphic representation of the attribute, we keep a pointer to the widget.
